abstract: Abstract Neutral bimetallic rhenium(I) bis-triazole pyrimidine halogen bonding (XB) and hydrogen bonding (HB) acyclic anion receptors are prepared and <sup>1</sup>H NMR titration investigations reveal the XB receptor exhibits significantly superior anion recognition behaviour.

author_highlights.sentence: We prepare neutral bimetallic rhenium(I) bis-triazole pyrimidine anion receptors.
We investigate both halogen and hydrogen bonding metal complexes.
Titration investigations reveal the XB receptor exhibits superior anion recognition.
DFT calculations further support and help to explain this behaviour.
